job.title: Machine Learning and Systems (MLSys) Engineer
job.description: pOctoML is an energetic new company changing how developers optimize and deploy machine learning models for their AI needs Were a team of machine learning systems leaders focused on making ML more efficient and easier to deploy by applying machine learning to itppbrppOctoML was founded by the creators of Apache TVM a popular opensource compiler that transforms ML models into highlyefficient binary code optimized for the specific hardware and model architecture We are building the Octomizer a cloudbased TVM as a Service product that enables developers to optimize and package their ML models through a modern web app as well as a rich API surfaceppbrppWe dream big but execute with focus and believe in creativity productivity and a balanced life We value diversity in all dimensions OctoML is growing fast and looking for MLSys engineers to join the teamppbrppstrongAs annbspMLSys Engineer you willnbspstrongpulliExplore machinelearningbased optimizations for performance and energy efficiencyliliDevelop hardwareaware optimization for emerging ML algorithmsliliImprove model ingestion and robustness at the front end of our pipelinenbspliliDevelop automation strategies for generating efficient ML modelsliliDevelop groundbreaking demos to wow your friends and win customersliulpbrppstrongOur idealnbspMLSys Engineer will havenbspstrongpulliExperience with ML frameworks such as PyTorch MxNET Tensorflow etcliliExperience implementing or optimizing linear algebra functions convolutions fully connected etcliliProficiency in Python C or CnbspliliExcellent verbal and written communication skillsliliAbility to empathize with coworkers and customersliliCollaborative working style able to self manage your time effectivelyliliBA or BS in Computer Science Computer Science Engineering Electrical amp Computer Engineering Electrical Engineering or anbspcloselyrelatednbspfield is required for this positionliulpbrppstrongLocationstrong Onsite postpandemic in Seattle WA or RemoteppnbspppstrongOur BenefitsstrongppOctoML aims to provide the resources that employees need to be healthy and comfortablepulli4 weeks paid personal time off  company paid holidays and company downtime 2x per yearlili100 employer paid premium for employee and dependents with a lowdeductible planliliFamily amp Medical Paid Time Off includes Maternity Paternity Adoption among othersliliRemote and telework setups for employees postCOVIDliliFlexible work hoursliulpbrppemOctoML is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity
